TopicTitle: Faster transition from VAB to launchpad

Articles.Content:
One of the reasons I stopped playing KSP was because of how long it took to switch scenes.  Experimenting with changes to my spacecraft became a tedious slog through the wait screen on every iteration.  Even 10-15 seconds interrupts your flow, momentum and fun.

I hope KSP 2 aims for instantaneous scene switching and less disruption to the fun!

We didn't hear anything from that front, but I suspect that between the game benefitting of 8 years of technology advances and the fact that we know that there will be some "flight scene VABS" (the BAE and the orbital VAB) I think that the scene changes will be faster, if not istantaneous.
I would certainly welcome the loading time between vab and launchpad NOT getting longer after every revert. Makes testing things more and more annoying.
